import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-todo-item', templateUrl: './todo-item.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo-item.component.css'], }) export class TodoItemComponent { itemForm = new FormGroup<{}>(); constructor(protected formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} initializeForm() { this.itemForm.addControl(); this.aprovacaoCadastroFilterForm = this.formBuilder.group({ nomUsuario: [], desEmail: [], codCliente: [], dataInicial: [this.fromDate, Validators.required], dataFinal: [this.toDate, Validators.required], }); } } Add new task
Due date Priority Level
